If I could make this a 6 star review I would.  My husband and I visited here on our honeymoon and were blown away by our experience!  The ambiance was really cool and chic with pictures of the beautiful Sofia Lauren covering the walls and a traditional tiled pizza oven.  We were served an aperitivo of Campari and Soda soon after we sat, and really got to enjoy the vibe of the restaurant.  We had one Margherita each, accompanied with a very cold bottle of white wine that the waiter recommended, which was a perfect match.  The pizza came out super fast and hot, just like in Napoli!! The dough was perfectly cooked, soft and tender with bold flavors and just the right amount of mozzarella :)  The owner and his staff seemed very attentive to their customers and really made my husband and I feel special as if we had known them forever.  We enjoyed our experience so much, we visited their sister restaurant near Av. Diagonal 'Margherita' which was also superb.  We will definitely be returning the next time we are in Barcelona!!
